data.title: OKC Thunder 2023 schedule, TV and streaming
data.meta_description: See how to watch Chet Holmgren, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and the rest of the OKC Thunder with this 2023-24 TV schedule and streaming guide.
data.text:
See how to watch or stream rookie Chet Holmgren, All-Star Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and the rest of the young, exciting OKC Thunder with this 2023-24 TV schedule and streaming guide. For the full NBA regular season schedule, see the main page.

OKC Thunder schedule 2023-24, TV and streaming

How can I watch Thunder games?

How can I watch Thunder games on NBA League Pass?

What you’ll get: Local out-of-market games, plus NBA TV. Base plan is $15/mo and Premium (which includes commercial-free games) is $23/mo. You can purchase either plan through the NBA app and NBA.com . You can also purchase League Pass as an add-on through Sling , Fubo, Amazon Prime, YouTube TV and more.

Where can I stream the Thunder on ABC, ESPN and TNT?

What you’ll get: Regular season and playoff games, including the NBA Finals. Subscribe to Sling Orange ($40/mo), DIRECTV STREAM ($75/mo), YouTube TV ($73/mo), Hulu + Live TV ($70/mo) or a traditional cable option like Xfinity.

You can also watch ESPN and ABC (but not TNT) with Fubo ($75/mo). TNT games are available to stream on Max through the new Bleacher Report add-on ($9.99/mo starting in February).

How can I get Bally Sports Oklaahoma?

You can stream Thunder games on Bally Sports Oklahoma through the Fubo base package, DIRECTV STREAM Choice package ($90/mo) or through the Bally Sports app ($20/mo). Bally Sports is also available through traditional cable options like Xfinity. Outside of OKC and the surrounding areas, Thunder games on Bally Sports Oklahoma can be watched on NBA League Pass.

How can I watch the Thunder on NBA TV?

What you’ll get: Regular season and some playoff games, but only out-of-market (all NBA TV games are blacked out in the participating markets).

Available with an NBA League Pass subscription, on Sling Orange and/or Blue as part of the Sports Extra add-on ($11), on Fubo as part of either the Fubo Extra add-on ($8/mo) or as part of the Elite Package ($85/mo), on DIRECTV STREAM via either the Sports Pack add-on ($15/mo, requires the $100/mo Choice Package) or as part of the Ultimate Package ($110/mo), and the YouTube TV base package ($73/mo).

Where can I get Thunder tickets?

See the Thunder in person at the Paycom Center — or catch them on the road — by purchasing tickets from Vivid Seats, SeatGeek or Gametime.

If you purchase an item through this page, this website may receive a commission.
